item.title: Fire towers in New York are illuminated to honor fire watchers who kept communities safe
item.description: Every year at summer's end, volunteers in New York illuminate historic fire towers on mountain summits, honoring fire watchers who keep communities safe in the Adirondack and Catskill Mountains.

item.title: Ugandan Olympic athlete dies after being severely burned in gasoline attack
item.description: Rebecca Cheptegei, who was 33, had competed at the Paris 2024 Olympic Games. She died from organ failure after being set on fire by a man local authorities described as Cheptegei's partner.

item.title: Tim Walz's NRA rating went from A to F. It's part of a shift from Democrats on guns
item.description: Vice presidential nominee Tim Walz went from being endorsed by the NRA to a fierce advocate for gun control. That evolution reflects a larger shift that has been happening within the Democratic Party over the last decade.

item.title: Should your car warn you that you’re speeding? California lawmakers vote yes
